entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning near noon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
